column3: I'm not sure adding a number here is a good idea - this makes editing harder, as sections have to be manually renumbered. As markdown has no way to auto-number sections (IIRC) it's better to just leave it.\n
I though it will give the reader a better optical identification when a new section starts. But i agree there might be renumbering/rearranging problems in future.\nRemoved numbers.\n
